title: Mourner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use a dead player's ability against your visitors at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may ask anonymously questions to the dead. You may ask infinite questions.
- Your answers are anonymous. The host will not send you any answers which contain any allusions to the identity of the player answering.
- The host will not send questions which intend to loophole this role's mechanics.
- If you use a corpse whose abilities requires a prior action to be taken first (Building as Trapper, dousing as Arsonist, etc) you will skip that and use that ability ability (Activating a trap, igniting, etc)
